channel.title: Posts on rrotan
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on rrotan

item.title: We are all concepts
Until
item.description: Work until we do not want to work Rest until we do not want to rest Eat until we do not want to eat Do not eat until we do want eat Live until we die Love until unlove

item.title: Meaning
item.description: If you think you are doing something meaningful Then you should know that anything is meaningless But since you know what you do is meaningless Anything you do becomes meaningful

item.title: We are losing at any time
If you want to get out of here
item.description: If you want to get out of here But no one can help you Dear! Attention! You actually have left there —— You have successfully left the first line of this poem!

item.title: Why must everything have a value
item.description: Everything must have a value Because if not “No value” will be its value

item.title: How can I give money to God
item.description: If we do not leave the money to ourselves We are giving the money to God

item.title: Why there is no absolute freedom
item.description: Because if so We will lose the freedom of unfreedom

item.title: Eternal mask
item.description: We always wearing a mask Because when we did not wear masks We were wearing a mask a mask called “maskless”

item.title: Humble
item.description: We were raped for the climax But paid for it in order to come again

item.title: Early pay-back
item.description: I didn’t owe you anything So if you think I did Please show me the IOU Since you can not show it So even if I really owe you something I don’t have to pay back now
